content:
It all started with a casual conversation with a friend. Little did I know that it would lead me down a path that would change my life forever. My friend told me about a little-known secret of using money from my 401K to purchase a property. It was a way to invest in real estate without dipping into my savings or taking out a loan. I was intrigued.

So, I decided to give it a try. After all, what did I have to lose? We purchased our first property, and to our surprise, we were able to borrow money from the rental property using an equity line of credit. This was the golden ticket to purchasing our second and third properties. It was like a domino effect, and we couldn't believe our luck.

In just three short years, we had acquired 14 doors and close to a million-dollar portfolio. I never thought I would be a real estate investor, but here I was, making money in my sleep.

But that was just the beginning. The universe had bigger plans for me. I was introduced to Hotel investing through a mastermind course with Davonne Reaves. This opened up a whole new world of investing that I never knew existed.

I was fascinated by the idea of owning a hotel, and I knew I had to do it. I invested in a hotel, and it was the best decision I ever made. Being a part of the Nassau Mastermind is expanding my view of what is possible with hotel and multi-family investing.

Real estate investing has given me the opportunity to leave a legacy for my family. It has changed my life in ways I never thought possible. And it can change yours too.

If you're interested in passively investing, let me know. I'm always looking for like-minded individuals who want to make their money work for them. So, don't be afraid to take that first step. You never know where it might lead you. The universe has a way of meeting you where you are, and for me, that was in real estate investing.
